titleStmt.title: Three sermons 1. The good fight. Preached at the funerall of Henry Sommaster of Pens-ford in the country of Deuon, Esquire. Ian. 1606. 2. The worth of the water of life. 3. Dauids longing, and Dauids loue. By Sam. Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

notesStmt.note: "The second sermon. The worth of the water of life" and "The third sermon. Dauids longing, and Dauids loue" with caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
